introduction:

experiments.name: To study the effect of change in the flow rate and temperature on the heat transfer coefficient under laminar flow conditions
To study the effect of change in the flow rate and temperature on the heat transfer coefficient under turbulent flow conditions
To determine the thermal conductivity of metals and study the effect of temperature
To study the effect of change in the flow rate and temperature on the heat transfer coefficient in a Shell & Tube heat exchanger
To study the effect of change in the flow rate and temperature on the heat transfer coefficient in a Plate heat exchanger
